summary: Update personal website to include user's profile photo, adjust Google Drive label to include "Projects" in brackets, and replace the footer line with a custom closing message.

existing_features.title: Update the Contact section Google Drive card text so it includes the word "Projects" in brackets, i.e., display "Google Drive (Projects)" for the Google Drive contact item.

Remove the footer line "© 2026. Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" and replace it with the following closing message (preserve the wording):
"Would love to connect and share my ideas and Vision about the data related work.
 Regards Vibhanshu"

new_feature_requests.summary: Add user's profile photo to the site (user provided a profile photo to upload/use).
Update the Google Drive label/text to include "Projects" in brackets (e.g., "Google Drive (Projects)").
Remove footer line "© 2026. Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" and replace with the provided message ending with "Regards Vibhanshu".

Replace the Hero section avatar image with the user-uploaded profile photo by generating/placing it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`, keeping the existing Hero avatar `img` src pointing to `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`. Use the uploaded `cropped_circle_image.png` as the source input for this asset.

projectName: Update profile photo asset, Google Drive label, and footer closing message
